content.raw:
I fixed two of the test worlds in 8462f44, so the physics test will now exit (it was hanging for two different reasons). It has two failing tests:
~~~
[  FAILED  ] PhysicsEngines/PhysicsTest.RevoluteJoint/2, where GetParam() = "simbody"
[  FAILED  ] PhysicsEngines/PhysicsTest.DropStuff/2, where GetParam() = "simbody"
~~~
@hsu Can you take a peek at those and see if they aren't parameter related? If not, then we can create issues and comment out portions.
